solution_line_template: In two weeks, the kitten measured {initial_length} x {doubled_factor} = <<{initial_length}*{doubled_factor}={length_after_two_weeks}>>{length_after_two_weeks} inches.
4 months later, the kitten measured {length_after_two_weeks} x {doubled_factor_again} = <<{length_after_two_weeks}*{doubled_factor_again}={current_length}>>{current_length} inches.
